text: Hao Wang (),family name second born 4 August 1989 in Harbin, Heilongjiang, is a Chinese chess grandmaster. In November 2009, Wang became the fourth ever Chinese player to cross the 2700 rating mark. He was the 2010 Chinese chess champion, and was ranked #1 in China and #15 in the world in July 2012. == References == Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Chinese chess players Category:Chess grandmasters Category:People from Harbin
title: Hao Wang
